title: Indian community creation for better understanding of mint club among Indians
body:
Most of the Indian users wanted to discuss in their native language so we created Indian community for Indian users so that they can clear their doubts and exchange information among each other in their regional languages 
1. Telegram channel for Indian users in Hindi
https://t.me/mintclubindiancommunity
2. Creation of MINTIND smart tokens in order to send the rewards for weekly Quiz in Indian community
3. We  Published educational articles regarding the Mint club in HINDI via medium  website 
https://medium.com/@teleraw42/buying-mint-on-pancakeswap-4845c158911

Some of the users find difficult to use services  because of language barrier so we have written articles in Hindi
1. Creation of Metamask and trustwallet 
https://medium.com/@teleraw42/how-to-create-trustwallet-and-metamask-6371e292c269 
2. How to transfer BNB from exchanges to wallets (wazirx/Binance->trustwallet/metamask)
https://medium.com/@teleraw42/how-to-add-bnb-to-metamask-and-trustwallet-9a90fd451cb2
3. Detailed procedure of how to buy mint tokens from pancakeswap 
https://medium.com/@teleraw42/buying-mint-on-pancakeswap-4845c158911
4. Procedure for buying Mintclub Smart Tokens on Mint.club website 
https://medium.com/@teleraw42/how-to-buy-mintclub-tokens-i-6703fa5812c8
Weekly quiz will be conducted for community members to increase the interaction between each other and to get familiarize about mintclub 
Rewards will be distributed via MINTIND tokens
Bsc address : 0xdd6DF365f37e68a9BcB1027D91DABAAd8a6E7338
author: 0xdd6DF365f37e68a9BcB1027D91DABAAd8a6E7338
